title: Dozens Arrested After Waco Biker Gang Shootout
teaser: A Sunday biker meet-up at a restaurant in Texas turned into a shootout between motorcycle gangs, leaving nine dead and 18 injured.
contentencoded:
A Sunday biker meet-up at a restaurant in Waco, Texas, turned into a shootout between motorcycle gangs, leaving nine dead and 18 injured. About 170 people were arrested on charges of engaging in organized crime.Â Naomi Martin has been covering the story for The Dallas Morning News and joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details.

Guest

  • Naomi Martin, public safety reporter for The Dallas Morning News. She tweets @NaomiMartin.
